item_category: UR55 Samsung UHD monitor delivers a stunningly beautiful 4K Ultra HD view of everything you watch, play, and read. HDR support brings a dynamic range of luminous blacks and whites to the screen. AMD FreeSync virtually eliminates screen tears and stutters for a completely fluid visual experience. Display with No Borders Simplistic design. Triple input interface provides seamless connectivity with your PC and AV equipment with Display Port 1.2 and 2 different HDMI ports making it the perfect partner for your game console as well as your PC.
review_text: Monitor arrived today and seems fine however the mains didn't have UK plug. So monitor remained useless until I frantically found a shaver adaptor. Nowhere was I warned prior to purchase that it will not have UK power plug. Apart from that once turned on, pluged in; it seems fine. Didn't contain DP cable included either
Im in love with this monitor! however i have of little of backlight bleed through. is there any way to fix that?
